translations: 软水草（原产于亚洲，20世纪60年代引入美国）

sentences.sentence: Hydrilla was found in Asia and was introduced to the United States in the 1960s.
sentences.translation: 软水草原产于亚洲，并在20世纪60年代引入美国。

sentences.sentence: The influence of the free floating macrophyte Hydrocharis dubia on the growth of the submerged macrophyte Hydrilla verticillata was studied by using different coverage of H.
sentences.translation: 通过黑藻和不同覆盖度水鳖的组合，研究了漂浮植物对沉水植物的影响。
